body:
Howdy there,
I am Zac. I am applying for mod with the intention of getting Senior Mod quickly. I have been criticized for the methods I use to push my agenda on avicus which include: threatening, ddosing, keylogging, leaking, and blackmailing. I find my methods effective and the best way to get avicus staff which I am generally extremely critical of to do things I believe are good either for myself or for the network. In an effort to become more translucent with the community and staff team to gain their trust despite the methods I have used in the past I will be accepting questions both on TS and here with full honesty as long as these questions are of substance and are not useless questions such as "What is your favorite color" or questions soliciting certain sensitive material such as "what was said in staff chat on 12/11/2016 at 5:30 pm?". An example of a question would be "How do you justify keylogging or ddosing morally?" or "How did you get steven unbanned?". Please note that I can and will only answer the questions to the best of my ability so if I do not know certain information I cannot share it. I would ask that despite the controversial topics and questions being asked staff allow this chat to remain open since I do this with the intention of being honest with the community and them. I hope that at the end of this you can see the benefits to having me as a Senior Mod and will support me in this en-devour. :)

I will cover a few things first:
I want Senior Mod to fix TS, the staff team and the rules. In fixing TS I intend to overhaul TS and rebuild it to get rid of useless features while retaining the core elements that make our TS such a great community building service. In fixing the staff team I intend to change the moderating program to focus more on activity and training especially in the mentor department. In fixing the rules I intend to make a public guideline as to which the staff team will abide by with reasonable leniency for moderator discretion. In addition the rules would be made to encompass the widest variety of infractions yet as to leave no doubt when punishing.

Thanks.

I have been criticized for the methods I use to push my agenda on avicus which include: threatening, ddosing, keylogging, leaking, and blackmailing. In an effort to become more translucent with the community and staff team to gain their trust despite the methods I have used in the past I will be accepting questions both on TS and here with full honesty as long as these questions are of substance and are not useless questions such as "What is your favorite color" or questions soliciting certain sensitive material such as "what was said in staff chat on 12/11/2016 at 5:30 pm?". An example of a question would be "How do you justify keylogging or ddosing morally?" or "How did you get steven unbanned?". Please note that I can and will only answer the questions to the best of my ability so if I do not know certain information I cannot share it. I would ask that despite the controversial topics and questions being asked staff allow this chat to remain open since I do this with the intention of being honest with the community and them. I hope that at the end of this you can see the benefits to having me as a Senior Mod and will support me in this en-devour. :)

I will cover a few things first:
I want Senior Mod to fix TS, the staff team and the rules. In fixing TS I intend to overhaul TS and rebuild it to get rid of useless features while retaining the core elements that make our TS such a great community building service. In fixing the staff team I intend to change the moderating program to focus more on activity and training especially in the mentor department. In fixing the rules I intend to make a public guideline as to which the staff team will abide by with reasonable leniency for moderator discretion. In addition the rules would be made to encompass the widest variety of infractions yet as to leave no doubt when punishing.

Thanks.
title: Make Avicus Great Again

replies.body:
I intend to overhaul TS and rebuild it to get rid of useless features while retaining the core elements that make our TS such a great community
Why didn't you do any of that while you were a TeamSpeak Developer?

I intend to overhaul TS and rebuild it to get rid of useless features while retaining the core elements that make our TS such a great community

replies.body:
1. I along with Venomous and Michael made an atlas update for avicus on another TS which fixed many issues. It was never released despite it being finalized 2 months before actual atlas and kylo being notified of it's completion.

2. I was a part of a team that had several disagreements about the direction we should be going in.

replies.body: I had access to TS before and the user database, not to mention I have a senior mod who leaks to me regularly (senior mods have access to it as well) if I wanted a regular user's ip I would have it. The only time I actually participated in ddosing someone on avicus is when they have threatened me or ddosed my friends. Outside of that it has all been threats as far as ddosing goes. If that makes you uneasy sorry, but honestly unless you have a properly set up vpn it is so easy to get your ip that you really shouldn't feel anymore uneasy than normally.

replies.body: I want to be senior mod to push this agenda. While I can't promise it will be done (due to me having to work with other seniors), I can promise you that I will be far more effective at pushing these changes than current seniors who are either inactive or unmotivated to change. At a senior mod level I want to change the way topics are handled. I want to make a voting doc where if an issue recieves 1/3 of the senior staff support for it to go to a vote then it gets entered into a doc. Where in order to vote senior mods must be able to explain their pov and vote within 72 hours at which point voting closes. This should help us get through issues quicker and help push more points on my agenda. I would also want to be assigned to the mod training and TS departments to help the sections that are more my specialty.
replies.body_tagged: I want to be senior mod to push this agenda. While I can't promise it will be done (due to me having to work with other seniors), I can promise you that I will be far more effective at pushing these changes than current seniors who are either inactive or unmotivated to change. At a senior mod level I want to change the way topics are handled. I want to make a voting doc where if an issue recieves 1/3 of the senior staff support for it to go to a vote then it gets entered into a doc. Where in order to vote senior mods must be able to explain their pov and vote within 72 hours at which point voting closes. This should help us get through issues quicker and help push more points on my agenda. I would also want to be assigned to the mod training and TS departments to help the sections that are more my specialty.

replies.body:
Question: What would be one of the hardest challenges do you think you'll face as a legislative entity in the staff team?

As a former admin to an aspiring to-be senior, I am curious to see your perspective as it intrigues me. Just a prediction of sorts.

And if you want, and make it to mod, I am willing to coach you and give advice providing you ask. I'd rather have you going in ready and prepared.

replies.body:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

replies.body:
"I did not ddos, kelog and blackmail people into ruining their lives or anything. I did it to the extent of reaching some benefit for either me, my friends or the network."

You just admitted that you did DDOS, Keylog  and blackmail people with this statement.

And this the logic of this statement is abysmal. Nonexistent. With regards to you and your friends - makes a lot of sense but towards the network? Absolutely not.

If Avicus elects another known troll and deviant to staff, public image of the server will plummet more than it already has.

And no offense to you or anything but why haven't you been banned yet? Considering all that you've done and your admission to doing ILLEGAL acts... you're about my age right? 17? 18? 19?

These carry PRISON sentences and are FELONIES. You should stop now. I say this for your safety and what is simply logical and pragmatic.

replies.body_tagged:

reply_to.body:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.
